title: Error : Could not process beacon block, beacon-chain sync
body:
I faced the following issue, when running the beacon-chain successfully after one day.  
The commit version used is : 72139c41ea8a9911900020ba2bff7455530e16f3

```
time="2019-07-06 03:30:50" level=info msg="Slot transition successfully processed" prefix=blockchain slotsSinceGenesis=234543
time="2019-07-06 03:30:51" level=error msg="Could not process beacon block: could not apply block state transition: could not update FFG checkpts: context deadline exceeded" prefix\
=regular-sync
time="2019-07-06 17:38:36" level=error msg="Could not read message from stream" error="stream reset" prefix=p2p
time="2019-07-06 19:10:36" level=error msg="Could not read message from stream" error="stream reset" prefix=p2p
time="2019-07-06 20:20:18" level=error msg="Could not read message from stream" error="stream reset" prefix=p2p
time="2019-07-07 04:58:42" level=error msg="Could not read message from stream" error="stream reset" prefix=p2p
time="2019-07-07 07:02:06" level=error msg="Could not read message from stream" error="stream reset" prefix=p2p
time="2019-07-07 10:13:12" level=error msg="Could not read message from stream" error="stream reset" prefix=p2p
time="2019-07-07 11:24:30" level=error msg="stream reset" prefix=regular-sync
time="2019-07-07 11:24:31" level=error msg="stream reset" prefix=regular-sync
time="2019-07-07 11:24:31" level=error msg="stream reset" prefix=regular-sync
time="2019-07-07 11:24:31" level=error msg="stream reset" prefix=regular-sync
time="2019-07-07 11:24:31" level=error msg="stream reset" prefix=regular-sync
time="2019-07-07 11:24:31" level=error msg="stream reset" prefix=regular-sync
time="2019-07-07 11:24:31" level=error msg="stream reset" prefix=regular-sync
time="2019-07-07 11:24:31" level=error msg=EOF prefix=regular-sync
SIGILL: illegal instruction
PC=0x55aad8 m=0 sigcode=1
oroutine 67146252 [running]:
net.cgoLookupServicePort.func1(0x4013053868, 0x53e41c, 0x40b76079d0, 0x10, 0x10, 0x0, 0x0, 0x40e701)
        GOROOT/src/net/cgo_unix.go:102 +0xf8 fp=0x4013053780 sp=0x4013053730 pc=0x55aad8
runtime: unexpected return pc for net.filterAddrList called from 0x1269dfb
stack: frame={sp:0x4013053780, fp:0x4013053860} stack=[0x4013052000,0x4013054000)
0000004013053680:  000000400f729b60  0000004013053868
0000004013053690:  000000000053e2fc <net.(*Resolver).internetAddrList+1420>  0000000001051d40
00000040130536a0:  000000400f729b60  00000040b76079d0
00000040130536b0:  0000000000000010  0000000000000010
00000040130536c0:  0000000000000000  0000000000000000
00000040130536d0:  000000000040e148 <runtime.mallocgc+1144>  0000000000000001

```
This is resolved with the new networking spec and revamped regular sync
